title: I have not been receiving chests (and rarely key fragments) for MONTHS
body:
I wasn't aware that I was supposed to be getting chests whenever I or a teammate got an S. I haven't  received any chests for months now, and  I estimate that I've probably  missed out on a TON of loot b/c not only am I not getting chests, but I seem to have stopped receiving key fragments as well.

EDIT: You can check my match history for evidence, where I have two S scores - this has been going on for a LONG time!

replies.body:
Just like Madouble said, you can only get [**one chest per champion per season**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/207884233). I did check you match history to see who you've been playing as, and it looks like you've played a lot of Blitz/Brand/and Cho'Gath who have already gotten their chests for this season. Regardless of who gets an S, you can still only get one chest per champ each season. 

Key fragments are also limited to 12 about every 28 days. Each frag you get also slightly lowers the chance of getting the next until you have all the key fragments you can get for the month.
